maxItem.description: Show only a certain number of the most recent logs on this page.

next.description: Displays the next page of output.

tail.description: Polls the FreeClimb API to retrieve and display new logs as they occur.

sleep.description: Determines time waited between request for tail command. Defaults at 1 second.

since.description: Determines time frame of logs to be printed out before starting tail. Ex.2h9m
